name: Shimmer Final Build
description:
Hello we are Team Tentative. Our game Shimmer is a 3D Puzzle Platformer which stimulates the emotions loneliness, fear and happiness through light, sound and color. Bounce your way through each level, traversing a challenging and immersive environment. Elevate your gameplay experience, using a dive bomb to reach new heights and more precarious platforms.

Controls

The following table explains the controls and their functions. There are 2 ways to experience the game, keyboard and controller.

Note: To navigate through the main menu, a mouse must be used.

Controls

Keyboard

Controller

Movement & Looking

W A S D & Mouse

Left & Right Joystick

Jump

Divebomb

Space (while jumping)

A or RT (while jumping)

Respawn (at last collected lightshard)

R

Y

Loading into different levels

I (Level 1)

O (Level 2)

P (Level 3)

Pause/Unpause

Escape

Start

A controls menu is available in the main menu as well as accessible during gameplay through the pause menu.
